businessSummary.oneLiner: Singapore-based global internet company operating Southeast Asia's largest e-commerce (Shopee), digital entertainment (Garena/Free Fire), and fintech (Monee) platforms
businessSummary.description: Sea Limited is a Singapore-headquartered global tech company operating three core businesses across Southeast Asia, Latin America, and Taiwan: e-commerce (Shopee), gaming (Garena), and digital financial services (Monee). TTM 2025 revenue $21.04B (+35.8% YoY), net income $1.42B. Signed expanded AI strategic partnership MOU with Google on 2/19. Q4 2025 earnings due 3/3, with Zacks #5 (Strong Sell) clashing sharply against Wall Street's Strong Buy consensus.
howTheyMakeMoney: Shopee: E-commerce commissions, advertising, logistics (SPX Express) - Q3 $3.8B (+36.6% YoY)
Garena: In-game virtual items from Free Fire etc. - Q3 $653M (+31.2% YoY), bookings $775M (+51% YoY)
Monee (formerly SeaMoney): Digital payments, lending, banking - Q3 $990M (+60.8% YoY)
keyProducts: Shopee - #1 e-commerce platform in SE Asia & LatAm (48% market share)
Garena Free Fire - Global mobile battle royale game (bookings +51% YoY)
Monee/ShopeePay - Digital payments & financial services (loan book $7.9B, +70% YoY)
SeaBank - Digital banking in Indonesia & Philippines

keyMetrics.name: P/E (TTM)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Reasonable for high-growth internet company. Based on EPS $2.29.

keyMetrics.name: Forward P/E (FY2026E)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Based on consensus EPS $4.25. PEG 0.45, attractive relative to growth.

keyMetrics.name: Operating Margin
keyMetrics.interpretation: Major improvement from FY2024's 3.94%. Economies of scale kicking in.

keyMetrics.name: Debt-to-Equity
keyMetrics.interpretation: Net cash $5.66B (~$9.56/share). Very healthy balance sheet.

keyMetrics.name: ROE / ROIC
keyMetrics.interpretation: Rapidly improving since profitability inflection. Net income +1,358% YoY.

growthDrivers.title: Shopee e-commerce dominance & monetization acceleration
growthDrivers.description: #1 in SE Asia with 48% market share. Q3 GMV $32.2B (+28% YoY). Ad revenue +70% YoY. Brazil fee hikes implemented.

growthDrivers.title: Google AI strategic partnership - agentic shopping & AP2 payments
growthDrivers.description: MOU signed 2/19 with Google. Shopee: Gemini-based AI agentic shopping. Monee: AP2 payment protocol adoption.

growthDrivers.title: Monee (fintech) hyper-growth - leading SE Asia digital finance
growthDrivers.description: Q3 revenue +60.8% YoY, loan book $7.9B (+70% YoY), NPL 1.1%. 28M active borrowers.

growthDrivers.title: Bullish options activity + deep value territory
growthDrivers.description: GuruFocus reports bullish options positioning. P/E, P/S, P/B all near 1-2 year lows. 11/12 analysts Buy, StockAnalysis consensus $189.

competitiveAdvantage.summary: Integrated ecosystem spanning SE Asian e-commerce, gaming, and fintech is the core competitive advantage. Cross-synergies between Shopee-Monee-Garena and proprietary logistics create high barriers to entry.

moats.description: Shopee's two-sided network and SPX Express logistics. 48% SE Asia market share.
E-commerce to payments to finance to entertainment super app ecosystem.
Country-specific optimization across 11 SE Asian markets for language, payments, logistics, and regulations.
Integrated data across e-commerce, payments, lending, and gaming. Strengthened by Google AI partnership.

competitors.name: TikTok Shop
competitors.detail: Rapid SE Asia growth via social commerce. 14.2% market share.

competitors.name: Lazada (Alibaba)
competitors.detail: #2 SE Asia e-commerce (16.4% share). Steadily losing market share.

competitors.name: MercadoLibre
competitors.detail: #1 LatAm e-commerce & fintech. Direct competitor to Shopee in Brazil.

competitors.name: Grab Holdings
competitors.detail: SE Asia super app. Indirect fintech competition with Monee.

recentNews.headline: GuruFocus: Bullish options activity observed on SE - valuations at 1-2 year lows
recentNews.significance: P/E 50.22 (2-year low), P/S 3.49 (1-year low), P/B 7.18 (1-year low) with increasing bullish options. Analyst target $181, recommendation score 1.8.

recentNews.headline: Zacks #5 (Strong Sell) clashes with Wall Street Strong Buy consensus
recentNews.significance: Zacks reflects downward EPS revisions while 11/12 Wall Street analysts maintain Buy. Q4 earnings on 3/3 will resolve the divergence.

recentNews.headline: Sea Limited signs expanded AI strategic partnership MOU with Google
recentNews.significance: Shopee: AI agentic shopping, Garena: AI game development, Monee: AP2 payment protocol adoption.

recentNews.headline: Shopee implements Brazil fee hikes - prioritizing monetization
recentNews.significance: Choosing profitability over aggressive expansion. Positive for near-term margin recovery.

recentNews.headline: Q4 2025 and FY2025 earnings date announced - March 3
recentNews.significance: Consensus Q4 revenue $6.78B, EPS $0.80. FY2025E revenue $23.12B (+37.4% YoY).

recentNews.headline: Morgan Stanley cuts SE target to $173 from $209 (Overweight maintained)
recentNews.significance: Near-term margin pressure concerns from growth investments. GMV 20%+ growth outlook maintained.

analystOpinions.notableComment: 11 of 12 analysts rate Buy. StockAnalysis 12-analyst consensus $189 (+65%). Morgan Stanley OW $173 (cut), Barclays Buy $226 (street high). Zacks #5 (Strong Sell) sharply contradicts Wall Street's Strong Buy. Q4 earnings on 3/3 will be decisive.

risks.title: Intensifying e-commerce competition from TikTok Shop & Temu
risks.description: TikTok Shop at 14.2% market share. Temu's ultra-low-price strategy driving MAU +55%.

risks.title: Zacks Strong Sell vs Wall Street Strong Buy - earnings uncertainty
risks.description: Zacks #5 (Strong Sell) reflects downward EPS revisions. Risk of sharp decline if Q4 earnings miss on 3/3.

risks.title: Shopee profitability vs growth trade-off
risks.description: Morgan Stanley & BofA target cuts reflect margin pressure concerns. Subsidy wars could reignite if competition intensifies.

risks.title: Technical weakness - trading below key moving averages
risks.description: $115 below both 50-day SMA ($129) and 200-day SMA ($154). Down 42% from 52-week high.

risks.title: Monee credit quality and regulatory risk
risks.description: Loan book $7.9B (+70%) expanding rapidly. NPL stable at 1.1% but could spike in economic downturn.

buyReasons.title: Deep undervaluation - 57% upside to consensus, PEG 0.45
buyReasons.rationale: At $115, average target $181 implies 57.4% upside. Forward P/E 27x. 11/12 Buy. Bullish options activity increasing.

buyReasons.title: Profitability turnaround accelerating - FCF $3.9B, net cash $5.7B, $1B buyback
buyReasons.rationale: Operating margin 8.2%, FCF $3.9B (18.5% margin). Net income +1,358% YoY.

buyReasons.title: Google AI partnership + super app ecosystem synergies
buyReasons.rationale: Google MOU on 2/19 drives simultaneous e-commerce, gaming, and AI payments innovation. SE Asia digital economy TAM $230B+.

buyReasons.title: Q4 2025 earnings (3/3) as catalyst
buyReasons.rationale: Consecutive earnings improvement trend. Meeting Q4 revenue consensus of $6.78B could trigger sharp re-rating.

overallOpinion: 38% revenue growth + profitability inflection (FCF $3.9B, net income +1,358%) achieved simultaneously. PEG 0.45 signals clear undervaluation
42% discount from 52-week high, 57% upside to consensus. Bullish options activity and valuations near 1-2 year lows
Zacks Strong Sell vs Wall Street Strong Buy in stark opposition - Q4 earnings on 3/3 is the battleground
Google AI partnership + Monee +61% + Brazil fee hikes keep structural growth drivers intact
TikTok Shop/Temu competition and trading below both 50-day/200-day SMAs pose near-term risk. Dollar-cost averaging strategy warranted

sources.name: GuruFocus - SE Bullish Options
sources.description: Bullish options activity, valuations at 1-2 year lows

sources.name: Simply Wall St - Brazil Fee Hikes
Insider Monkey - SE Long-Term Growth
sources.description: Long-term growth potential despite short-term pressure
